en.Name: Name
en.Sofern der Gast keinen Namen eingibt, wi: This name will be used if the guest does not state one.
en.Verknüpfen Sie einen Ordner mit diesem R: Link a file folder with this room. All files in that folder will be uploaded automatically when the meeting starts. You can switch between files in the meeting.
en.Verwenden dieses Treibers zulassen: Allow this driver to be used
en.Zum Hauptordner - Ordnerauswahl aufheben: Back to main folder - revoke selected folder
en.Administrationsseite für das Plugin zur: Plug-in administration page for holding and managing live online meetings, seminars and video conferences.
en.Durchführung und Verwaltung von Live-Onl: Conduct and manage live online meetings, events and  video conferencing. Face-to-face communication can be used to bridge distances, external experts can be involved and students can be accompanied in projects and internships.
en.Arbeitsbereich zum Anpassen der Gesamtan: Workspace to customize the overall view of a course meeting.
en.Gesamtansicht aller von Ihnen erstellten: View of all meetings you have created sorted by semester or by name.
en.Das gesuchte Meeting existiert nicht meh: The meeting does not exists anymore!
en.Legen Sie fest, ob neben Lehrenden auch: Specify whether not only teachers but also participants should have access to the recordings.
en.Bei Aktivierung dieser Option können aus: If this option is activated, only moderators can see the webcams shared by participants.
en.Opencast Series id kann nicht gefunden w: Opencast series ID cannot be found!
en.Dieser Raum in diesem Kurs kann nicht ge: This room in this course cannot be found!
en.Konnte dem Meeting nicht beitreten, Komm: Could not join the meeting, communication with the meeting server failed.
Could not join the meeting, communication with the meeting server failed. (
en.Es existiert bereits ein gleichnamiger R: A room with the same name already exists.
en.Der Raumname darf nicht leer sein: The room name cannot be empty
en.Dieser Raum konnte nicht gefunden werden: This room could not be found
en.Es ist keine Kontaktadresse hinterlegt!: There is no contact address configured! Please contact a system administrator!
en.Der gewünschte Ordnertyp ist ungültig!: The select folder type is invalid!
en.Opencast wird als Aufzeichnungsserver ve: Opencast is used as recording server. This function is in test mode and errors may still occur.
en.Die Überprüfung der Servereinstellungen: The verification of the server settings for %s was not successful, but was saved anyway.
en.Virtueller Raum, mit dem Live-Online-Tre: Virtual room with which live online meetings, courses and  video conferences can be held. Participants can hear each other  during a meeting and, via a connected webcam, see and work with each other, if available. Slides can be presented and queries can be carried out. A window in the user interface of one's own computer can be made visible to others in order to show certain websites or applications to the participants, for example. In addition, the course can be recorded and made available to interested parties.
en.Face-to-face-Kommunikation mit Adobe Con: Face-to-face communication with Adobe Connect or BigBlueButton
en.Videokonferenz- und Veranstaltungsmöglic: Video conferencing and event facility;Present live on the web and draw and work together;Communication via microphone and camera;Ideal for decentralised learning and working groups;Linking to already existing own rooms
